page.title: 18PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: We play{Postman}on a hot day. Everyone sits in a circle. Then one person takes a skipping rope and walks or runs round the outside of a circle. Nobody in the circle is allowed to look behind them. The person with the rope drops it behind someone. When the rope has been dropped you may look be- hind. Whoever has the rope behind them picks it up and runs round in the opposite direction. The last person to reach the empty place is the next postman. {Queeny Ball behind the Wall}is a game for three or more children. The person who is on it turns away from the rest of the players. Someone has a rope and hides it on themself or someone else. The person on it turns round and says who has the rope and where it is hid- den. If wrong 'he' tries again, but, if right,the one with the rope is'he'.
